q: warns Social Security may be on Franklin Roosevelt chopping block, a US Barack Obama recently told Raw Story, expressing deep uneasiness about Barack Obama 's noncommittal attitude toward staving off cuts to the cherished program. I have to tell you, I have been on the phone to the very, very, very highest levels of the Barack Obama administration, and the responses that I am getting are not assuring, Sen. Bernie Sanders ( I-VT) said in an exclusive interview. "What I'm told is that no definitive decisions have been made on the issue of Social Security- I expect that is probably true."

friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's "Meet The Press." Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.
